neutral: Ah sure, you're out early. Roads are quiet today.
You wouldn’t think it, but I remember when this street was packed.
angry: Watch where you’re goin', will ya?
I’ve no patience for young lads rushin’ about!
If you're lookin’ for trouble, find someone else.
happy: Grand day, isn’t it? Makes the bones feel young again.
Fair play to ya, always a smile on ya.
Ah, that’s a fine sight—someone enjoyin’ the day.
